page.title: 18BOHUNT - RECREATIONAL CENTRE
page.content: Bohunt leads a double life as a busy working school and a leisure recreational centre. It caters for the young and old, and has activities inside and out of school life. The community come here during the day, evenings and holidays to take pleasure in the interests provided. These interests can be coached or there for your personal use. Apart from the obvious sporting facilities there are many aspects of creative studies, such as metalwork, sewing. For the more outgoing types there are discos and musical productions. YOu can play an instrument. The Community Centre is a place for friends and the community to meet and enjoy the company of others who have come here to enjoy the activities provided.
